column5: FIRST OFF CAN SOMEONE TELL ME WHEN CRAPPIE OPENS ON SCUGOG??? SECONDLY WHAT IS THE IDEAL WATER TEMP FOR FEEDING BASS(LARGEMOUTH) TX FOR ANY HELP
You got the bass bug now dont you.LOL  Dont know the answer to yer first question.Im sure the regs book can tell ya. Yer second one,68 deg,if I remember right.

Don't know the nswer to the bass bite question (they seem to bite anytime warm or cold)  Scugogs is part of the Kawarthas and opens for panfish 4th Saturday of April...25th this year...can't hardly wait...  BTW...don't fish off the causeway...fish sanctuary till 2nd Saturday of May

TY GENTS YA GOT THAT BASS BUG BITE BAD. ALREADY ENTERED IN 2 TOURNEMENTS AND STILL GOT 2 MONTHS TO GO LOL TX FOR THE HEADS UP BEANS. COULDNT HANDLE THE BUCKET BRIGADE ANYWAYS. BOATS THE ONLY WAY TO GO NOW  LOL
1) Same day as trout opener  2) I have heard it is as low as 68 and as high as 75. Low 70s on the kawarthas usually does well for me
I'm thinking it might even be different for LMB vs. SMB?  and water body dependant?
IF IT IS THEN 99% OF MY FISHIN IS DONE ON SCUGOG!! TX
SM prefer cooler water temps. Most of them hang out in the deeper water near offshore structure during the heat of the summer.
I never thought I'd see the day CC askin for bass info  Call me brother
